content: I think I'll go ahead with the Barclays Arrival Plus card. I've had good experiences with Barclays in the past, and the 70,000-mile bonus is a great offer. I'll make sure to meet the spending requirement to earn the bonus. By the way, I'm still undecided about which route to take to Europe, but I think I'll focus on flying from JFK to Paris on Air France. I had a good experience flying with them from JFK to LAX a few months ago, and I'm hoping to get an upgrade to premium economy using my miles.
